models¶

model_parameters.py¶

predict_model.py¶

src.models.predict_model.do_min_max_scaler_predict(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, numerical_columns, scaler)[source]¶

This function allows you to transform features by scaling each feature to a given range

Parameters

df – dataframe to scale

:type df:pd.DataFrame :param numerical_columns: list of numerical columns in the dataframe :type numerical_columns: list :param scaler: scaler :type scaler: MinMaxScaler :return: modified dataframe :rtype: pd.DataFrame

src.models.predict_model.predict_h2o(model_type: str, version: str)[source]¶

This function allows you to make predictions with H2O models

Parameters

  • model_type (str) – model type

  • version (str) – version of the model

src.models.predict_model.predict_xgboost(version: str)[source]¶

This function allows you to make predictions with xgboostClassifier Model

Parameters

  • model_type (str) – model type

  • version (str) – version of the model

src.models.predict_model.preprocess_numerical_features_test(df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, numerical_columns, mode)[source]¶

This function allows you to fill NULL/NA values with the mode

Parameters

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – the dataframe to preprocessed

  • numerical_columns (list) – list of numerical columns in the dataframe

  • mode (dict) – dictionary of numerical columns and associated mode

Returns

the modified dataframe

Return type

pd.DataFrame

This function allows you to preprocess the test set

df
